title: Android Email Archive
creator: paul680
content:
Hi, recently installed Thunderbird as sick of Goog ramming their data harvesting crap down my throat.

Thunderbird seems great so far but can't seem to find out how to archive email in the Android app? Neither left or right swipe does an archive and there's no button either. Have it working fine in the desktop app with the archive button.

Aware of the archive / All Mail scenario.

Thanks,

Paul.

title: cannot create new accounts manually on thunderbird mobile
creator: marc173
content:
When I try to create new accounts manually to my own imap server. It fails when I try to configure the server in Thunderbird mobile. When trying to connect to the server, I get the message: "unknown error unexpected character *(42)" There is no * in the fields I introduced in the configuration. The problem appears with the second account I try to add. The first (to the same server but a different email address and login) worked fine.

How can this be solved ? Is it a bug in mobile thunderbird ?
